snippet: The Blackhawks star broke his left clavicle on Feb. 24, but he has returned for the playoffs, seven weeks after the injury, and has scored seven goals and added six assists in 10 games.
abstract: Chicago Blackhawks winger Patrick Kane, who returned to ice just seven weeks after breaking his collarbone, has made major impact in playoffs, scoring seven goals and adding six assists in 10 games.
lead_paragraph: The Blackhawks star broke his left clavicle on Feb. 24, but he has returned for the playoffs, seven weeks after the injury, and has scored seven goals and added six assists in 10 games.

headline.main: Patrick Kane’s Quick Return and Healthy Scoring Touch Provide a Salve for a City
headline.print_headline: Kane’s Quick Return and Healthy Scoring Touch Provide a Salve for a City
